title: Ranked Bans
body: So I have not played much ranked so far this season, and I wanted to get back into. With the changes to who gets to ban in ranked games it will be coming up a lot more often. So I was wondering if people think their are any must ban champs after the Mage update. Or should I focus my bans on champs that I can't lane against/champs that would disrupt what I've seen of our team comp so far

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Mozzie25,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ZErrMugv,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-16T22:42:47.457+0000)
>
> So I have not played much ranked so far this season, and I wanted to get back into. With the changes to who gets to ban in ranked games it will be coming up a lot more often. So I was wondering if people think their are any must ban champs after the Mage update. Or should I focus my bans on champs that I can&#039;t lane against/champs that would disrupt what I&#039;ve seen of our team comp so far
Zed, Lucian amumu
